decks.notes: This deck focuses on controlling the battlefield through a combination of powerful creatures and spell effects. By utilizing cards like Archangel of Wrath and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, the deck aims to establish dominance and overwhelm opponents. Leyline Binding and Ossification are used to handle threats from the opponent, while cards like Topiary Stomper and Herd Migration provide additional support and creature presence. The deck also includes cards like Etali, Primal Conqueror and Sunfall for additional power and versatility. Overall, the deck emphasizes control and resource management to secure victory.
